summary: This document contains financial statements related to an international charitable account managed by Bear Stearns & Co. Inc. It includes detailed transaction activities, portfolio holdings, and cash flow analyses for various periods, highlighting the account's balances, income summaries, and investment activities.

persons.name: Jeanie Brennan

persons.context: Dcherman is identified as the account executive servicing the account, providing oversight and management.

events.title: End of Year Financial Summary
events.description: The document summarizes the financial status of the international charitable account as of December 31, 2003, detailing cash balances and investment performance.

keyFacts: The document includes multiple financial summaries and transaction details for an international charitable account.
Jeanie Brennan is the primary account holder, with Dcherman serving as the account executive.
The account shows significant cash balances and investment activities, including dividends and reinvestments.
The financial statements reflect various periods, with detailed cash flow analyses and portfolio compositions.
